reviews.comments: This is one of my favorite places. I want to hire their decorator to furnish my apartment. Try out the huge selection of incredible appetizers. Everything was just so yummy. I'd give more than 5 stars if I could!
Decent place. Everything I tried was bursting with flavor. Everything was mostly decadent. Try out the huge selection of incredible appetizers. I was happy to see how clean everything was. 4 stars.

It was much better than I expected. The waitress did an excellent job. This was one of the best mouth-watering burgers I've had grace my taste buds in a long time. The desserts must be sprinkled with crack because I just craved for more and more. Satisfactory experience, will come again.

I can summarize my visit in one word: Horrible. My shoes were stained with rat droppings after leaving this place. I shouldn't have to pay good money to be served vegetables from a can. 1 star. Never again.

This place was nearby and I decided to check it out. I felt the prices were too high given the quality of the food. Some of my favorite dishes are no longer available. This place is very dumpy and in a serious need of a makeover. There were bits of food stuck to my silverware. I would be hard pressed to come back.
This place was just ok. I felt the prices were too high given the quality of the food. Overhyped. The tofu dish tasted spongy and a bit bland
This place was nearby and I decided to check it out. Try out the huge selection of incredible appetizers. The entree I had was sublime. The waiter was prompt and polite.

I can summarize my visit in one word: Traumatizing. Seriously, how difficult is it to get a clean glass around here? Overhyped. The dead flies on the window sill indicated to me that they don't do a good job cleaning and the flies found the food to be toxic. I wish I could put a sign out front that said DON'T EAT HERE!
Yumm-o! Everything was simply decadent. I was happy to see how clean everything was. Everything was just so yummy. They got a new customer for life!

I really wanted to like this place. Everything tasted either microwaved or straight from a can. The tofu dish tasted spongy and a bit bland. Some of my favorite dishes are no longer available. They need to get their act together before I set foot in this place again.

I'm torn about this place. Overhyped. The photos of the food were appetizing and palpable, but didn't live up to the hype. The waitress was mediocre at best. This place deserves its very average rating.

It was much better than I expected. This was one of the best mouth-watering steaks I've had grace my taste buds in a long time. The waitress did an excellent job. There were a lot of interesting decorations on the walls. Everything was just so yummy. I removed a star because the table was a little sticky.

My taste buds are still singing from our last visit! The waitress was prompt and polite. I want to hire their decorator to furnish my house. Make sure to save room for dessert, because that was the best part of the meal! Overall experience

This place was nearby and I decided to check it out. The menu didn't match the one on their website. The ambiance gives off an earthy feel-good vibe. I found the entrees to be somewhat agreeable to my personal flavor-profile

Lame. My water glass was stained with lipstick and had bits of food floating in it. Everything tasted either microwaved or straight from a can. I think this place was featured on Kitchen Nightmares, or at least it should have been. I wouldn't come back here on a dare.

I can't believe this place is still in business! The dead flies on the window sill indicated to me that they don't do a good job cleaning and the flies found the food to be toxic. The center of my steak was so frozen it started singing Let It Go. Even Chef Boyardee would be disgusted by this sorry attempt at a meal. The kitchen screwed up my order completely, mixing it up with someone else's. It took almost an hour to get it corrected! Wild horses couldn't drag me back here.
This place had a lot of heart. The waiter did an excellent job. The decor was unique and incredible. 4 stars of quality.
Decent place. The service was good for the most part but the waiter was a bit rude. Everything was mostly decadent

This is one of my favorite places. Everything was just so yummy. I found the ambiance to be very charming. The food was flavorful, savory, and succulent. The waitress did an excellent job. This is definitely a spot I'll be frequenting.

I was pleasantly surprised. This was one of the best mouth-watering steaks I've had grace my taste buds in a long time. The waiter did an excellent job. After my meal, I was knocked into a food coma. Everything was just so yummy. I had a satisfactory experience and will have to try it again.

I can summarize my visit in one word: Horrible. I heard a rumor that the vegetarian dishes are prepared alongside the meat. My water glass was stained with lipstick and had bits of food floating in it. Everything tasted either microwaved or straight from a can. I wish I could put a sign out front that said ABANDON HOPE ALL YE WHO ENTER HERE!
Gross! Overhyped. The steak was so undercooked it started eating the salad. I wish I could put a sign out front that said RUN AWAY!
Decent place. Everything was just so yummy. The waitress did an excellent job. The food was flavorful, savory, and succulent. I had a satisfactory experience and will have to try it again.
I've got a fetish for good food and this place gets me hot! Everything was simply decadent. Try out the huge selection of incredible appetizers.

I felt like this place wasn't trying at all. I heard a rumor that the vegetarian dishes are prepared alongside the meat. I found the entrees to not be very agreeable to my personal flavor-profile. I gave this place two stars because I was feeling extra generous.

This place was nearby and I decided to check it out. The food was cooked to perfection. The ambiance gives off an earthy feel-good vibe. Everything was just so yummy. The waitress did an excellent job. Satisfactory experience, will come again.
Decent place. The waiter was prompt and polite. Everything was mostly decadent. Make sure to save room for dessert, because that was the best part of the meal! 4 stars of satisfaction.

This place had a lot of heart. I found the entrees to be very agreeable to my personal flavor-profile. The service was good for the most part but the waitress was a bit air-headed. I removed a star because my coffee mug was dirty.

I have been here several times before. I found the entrees to be somewhat agreeable to my personal flavor-profile. The service was good for the most part but the waiter was a bit rude. The menu didn't match the one on their website. The ambiance gives off an earthy feel-good vibe
This place was nearby and I decided to check it out. The waitress was prompt and polite. This was one of the best mouth-watering steaks I've had grace my taste buds in a long time.

When I walked in, I really wasn't expecting much. The ambiance gives off an earthy feel-good vibe. I asked for my steak medium-well, but it was burnt to a crisp. The menu didn't match the one on their website. I would be hard pressed to come back.

This place was nearby and I decided to check it out. The food was cooked to perfection. The service was good for the most part but the waitress was a bit rude. I would have rated this higher, but the chairs were a little sticky.

OMG! So good! I was happy to see how clean everything was. The decor was unique and incredible. Everything was just so yummy. The appetizers must be sprinkled with crack because I just craved for more and more. Overall experience

Lame. Too many things on the menu look like crap, smell like crap, and taste like crap. I shouldn't have to pay good money to be served vegetables from a can. I had a less than satisfactory experience and will probably not be here again.

I have been here several times before. The decor was unique and incredible. Everything was mostly decadent. I was happy to see how clean everything was. Try out the huge selection of incredible appetizers. Satisfactory experience, will come again.
This place was nearby and I decided to check it out. The waiter was mediocre at best. Overhyped. The food was all right but seriously lacked presentation. This place deserves its very average rating.
